meta.title: QCI - OEM Mosquito Coil Manufacturer
meta.description: Quality Coils Industries (QCI) - Trusted OEM mosquito coil manufacturer since 1973. We serve global brands across Japan, Korea, USA, South America, and South Africa with innovative, high-quality mosquito coil solutions and custom formulations.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Delivering Excellence since 1973
about.description: Quality Coils Industries, we are a trusted OEM manufacturer specializing in high-quality mosquito coils, serving global brands across Japan, Korea, the USA, South America, and South Africa with innovative, effective, and environmentally responsible solutions. With nearly five decades of expertise, we offer custom formulations, advanced production technologies, and private labeling services to help businesses establish a strong market presence.

expansion.title: Expanding Our Legacy
expansion.subtitle: QCI Malaysia & QCI Thailand
expansion.malaysiaText: QCI Malaysia, established in 1973. The pioneer in OEM mosquito coil manufacturing, committed to superior quality and innovation.
expansion.thailandText: QCI Thailand, established in 1993. Strengthening our regional and international supply chain with advanced production capabilities.

advantage.title: The QCI Advantage
advantage.subtitle: Exclusive Separate Production Lines
advantage.leftText: We are the only OEM manufacturer with dedicated production lines for different mosquito coil formulations. This ensures:
benefits: Unmatched Quality Control – Each formulation is produced separately, ensuring purity, consistency, and optimal performance.
Zero Cross-Contamination – Custom formulations remain uncompromised, catering to diverse market needs.
Greater Market Flexibility – Brands can target both eco-conscious consumers (low-smoke, indoor-friendly) and high-smoke repellency markets.
Efficient & Scalable Production – Streamlined processes for shorter lead times and a reliable global supply chain.

trust.title: Your Trusted Partner in Mosquito Coil Manufacturing
trust.subtitle: Built on a foundation of Quality, Commitment, and Integrity, QCI delivers mosquito coils that meet the highest industry standards:

quality.text: Stringent manufacturing processes ensure safe, effective, and long-lasting mosquito protection.

commitment.text: Continuous innovation drives our ability to enhance product efficiency and customer satisfaction.

integrity.text: Transparent operations, ethical business practices, and strict regulatory compliance.

offerings.title: Our Offerings

items.title: Quality & Compliance
items.description: Adherence to international safety and environmental standards.

items.title: Custom OEM Solutions
items.description: Full-service product development, branding, and packaging.

items.title: Reliable Supply Chain
items.description: Global distribution with efficient and timely deliveries.

offerings.closingText1: At QCI, we don't just manufacture mosquito coils.
offerings.closingText2: We create market-leading solutions that protect homes, businesses, and communities from mosquito-borne diseases.

meta.title: About QCI - Leading OEM Mosquito Coil Manufacturer
meta.description: Quality Coils Industries (QCI) - A legacy of excellence since 1973. Learn about our OEM expertise, global reach, and commitment to producing high-quality mosquito coils in Malaysia and Thailand.

intro.label: QCI Malaysia & QCI Thailand: Trusted OEM Partners Since 1973
intro.description: QCI is a leading OEM manufacturer specializing in high-quality mosquito coils, serving global brands with innovative, effective, and environmentally responsible solutions. With nearly five decades of expertise, we provide custom formulations, cutting-edge production technologies, and private labeling services to empower businesses worldwide.
intro.malaysiaText: QCI Malaysia, established in 1973 was pioneering in OEM mosquito coil manufacturing, setting the industry standard for quality and innovation.
intro.thailandText: QCI Thailand, established 1993 was us strengthening our regional and international supply chain with advanced production capabilities and strategic market access.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: At QCI, mosquito control should never come at the expense of safety or sustainability. That's why our products are developed using scientifically tested ingredients and manufactured under strict quality control measures to meet international regulatory standards. We continuously invest in research and development to create innovative, long-lasting mosquito coils that offer superior protection against vector-borne diseases.

expertise.title: OEM Expertise & Global Reach
expertise.subtitle: As an experienced OEM manufacturer, we partner with brands worldwide to produce customized mosquito coils tailored to specific market needs.

formulation.title: Formulation
formulation.subtitle: A specific formulation for enhanced mosquito repellency
formulation.description: Our proprietary formula provides long-lasting protection against mosquito bites, ensuring comfort and peace of mind.

scent.title: Scent
scent.subtitle: A unique scent to suit our customers' preferences
scent.description: Customize the scent profile to match our customers' preferences, making repellent use a pleasant and personalized experience.

branding.title: Branding
branding.subtitle: Custom branding and private labeling
branding.description: Stand out in the market with distinctive branding and private labeling options tailored to your brand's identity and customer expectations.

packaging.title: Packaging
packaging.subtitle: Specialized packaging solutions
packaging.description: Choose from an array of packaging solutions designed to protect the product, enhance its appeal, and ensure convenience for your customers.

expertise.bottomText: Our team delivers tailored solutions to give your brand a competitive edge. With state-of-the-art production facilities in Malaysia and Thailand, we efficiently fulfill bulk orders while maintaining product integrity.

quality.title: Quality Control & Production Process
quality.subtitle: Ensuring Excellence In Every Step
quality.description: Our mosquito coil manufacturing follows strict ISO 9001:2008 quality standards. Every step is monitored to maintain consistency, safety, and efficiency.
quality.altBackground: QCI mosquito coil stamping production process

team.title: Team
team.name: Mr. Yeoh Hon Poh - Chairman / Founder
team.description: Meet Mr. Yeoh, the visionary entrepreneur behind QCI. With an unwavering commitment to innovation and sustainability, Mr. Yeoh has revolutionized the industry, ensuring families can enjoy mosquito-free environments. His journey from humble beginnings to leading a top-tier manufacturing powerhouse is filled with inspiring milestones.
team.alt: Mr. Yeoh Hon Poh, QCI Chairman and Founder

partner.title: Partner with QCI Malaysia & QCI Thailand
partner.description: Join us in building a safer, mosquito-free future today.

meta.title: Our Team - QCI Leadership & Management
meta.description: Meet the leadership team behind Quality Coils Industries (QCI). Our experienced executives drive innovation, quality, and sustainable manufacturing in mosquito coil production.

yeoh.alt: Yeoh Hon Poh, Founder and Chairman of QCI
yeoh.name: Yeoh Hon Poh
yeoh.description: Mr. Yeoh brings over 50 years of leadership experience in the manufacturing and consumer goods industry. Under his strategic vision, QCI Malaysia has expanded its global presence, solidifying its reputation as a leading OEM manufacturer of mosquito coils. His expertise in corporate governance and business development ensures the company's continuous growth and commitment to excellence

andrew.alt: Andrew Yeoh, Managing Director of QCI
andrew.name: Andrew Yeoh
andrew.description: With a background in manufacturing and business management, Mr. Andrew has been instrumental in driving QCI Malaysia's innovation and operational efficiency. His leadership focuses on sustainable manufacturing practices, quality assurance, and international market expansion. Under his direction, QCI has strengthened partnerships with global brands, delivering high-performance mosquito coils that meet stringent regulatory standards.

wong.alt: Wong Hon Kai, Chief Financial Officer of QCI
wong.name: Wong Hon Kai
wong.description: With extensive experience in corporate finance and risk management, Mr Wong manages QCI Malaysia's financial strategy and long-term sustainability. His expertise in financial planning, compliance, and global trade ensures the company maintains financial stability while pursuing strategic growth initiatives.

ng.alt: Ng Jun Kee, General Manager of QCI
ng.name: Ng Jun Kee
ng.description: A specialist in manufacturing and supply chain management, Mr Ng oversees QCI's production operations, ensuring seamless execution and quality control. With decades of experience in industrial automation and process optimization, he has played a crucial role in developing QCI's exclusive separate production lines for wood-based and charcoal-based coils, enhancing efficiency and product integrity.

meta.title: QCI Products - High-Performance Mosquito Coils
meta.description: Quality Coils Industries offers premium mosquito coils including smokeless, wood-based, charcoal-based coils and pre-mix powder. Custom OEM solutions with various colors, aromas, and packaging options for global markets.

hero.heading: Our Products
hero.subheading: High-Performance Mosquito Coils for Every Market
hero.description: At QCI, we specialize in manufacturing high-performance mosquito coils designed for maximum protection, efficiency, and market adaptability. With over 50 years of expertise, we cater to various product specifications, including different colors, active ingredients, sizes, burning times, and aromas. Our dedicated production lines ensure the highest quality standards, allowing brands to choose between charcoal-based coils and wood-based coils without cross-contamination

aromas.heading: Customizable Aromas
aromas.description: To enhance market appeal, we offer mosquito coils in various colors, each paired with a unique scent. These specialty coils combine protection with pleasant aromas, making them ideal for diverse markets worldwide.

packing.heading: Custom Packing Solutions
packing.description: Quality Coils Industries offers a comprehensive range of packaging designed with efficiency and effectiveness in mind. Our products are crafted to provide reliable protection against mosquitoes and other pests, ensuring a peaceful and enjoyable environment for you and your family.

items.alt: Paper dispenser box mosquito coil packaging
items.label: Paper Dispenser Box

bases.alt: Pre-mix powder for mosquito coil manufacturing
bases.label: Pre-Mix Powder

smokeless.heading: Smokeless Mosquito Coil
smokeless.description: Our smokeless mosquito coil is ideal for indoor use and for consumers who prefer a low-smoke yet highly effective repellent. Using advanced formulation technology, these coils emit minimal smoke while ensuring long-lasting mosquito protection.
benefits: Ideal for indoor environments – safe for enclosed spaces with minimal air pollution
Low-irritation formula – suitable for sensitive individuals and families
Highly effective – provides consistent mosquito protection for hours
Customizable aromas – lemongrass, lavender, sandalwood, or unscented

wood.heading: Wood-Based Mosquito Coil
wood.description: Our wood-based mosquito coil is a premium, environmentally friendly alternative that offers low-smoke mosquito protection. Made from natural wood-based materials, these coils ensure efficient repelling without excessive smoke emissions, making them ideal for both indoor and outdoor use.
benefits: Produced in a dedicated green coil line – no contamination with charcoal-based products
Low-smoke, clean-burning formula – designed for health-conscious consumers
Eco-friendly & sustainable – made from renewable wood-based materials
Mild yet effective – suitable for homes, restaurants, and outdoor patios

charcoal.heading: Charcoal-Based Mosquito Coil
charcoal.description: Our charcoal-based mosquito coil is formulated for maximum effectiveness, making it perfect for outdoor environments. It produces stronger smoke, creating a protective barrier that keeps mosquitoes away in open areas.
benefits: Dedicated black coil production line – ensuring purity and consistency
Powerful repellent action – effective in high-risk mosquito areas
Long-lasting burn time – extended protection for outdoor settings
Best for camping, gardens & tropical climates – protects against mosquito-borne diseases

premix.heading: Mosquito Coil Pre-Mix Powder
premix.description: Our pre-mix powder is a ready-to-use formulation designed for mosquito coil manufacturers looking for trouble-free production. This high-quality blend eliminates the need for additional quality control testing, making it an ideal solution for brands aiming to manufacture their own coils efficiently.
benefits: Customizable formulation – tailored to specific market needs
Easy-to-use pre-mix – ensures uniformity in production
Compatible with both charcoal & wood-based coils
Scientifically tested for effectiveness
Ready-to-ship premix powder available in customer-preferred sizes

cta.heading: Bring high-quality mosquito coil products to your market.
cta.buttonAria: Contact us about our mosquito coil products

meta.title: OEM Advantage - Quality Mosquito Coil Manufacturing
meta.description: Discover QCI's OEM advantage in mosquito coil manufacturing. Dedicated production lines for wood-based and charcoal coils. 50+ years expertise in Malaysia and Thailand. Custom formulations and private labeling available.

hero.heading: Learn More About Our OEM Advantage
hero.paragraph1: At QCI Malaysia and QCI Thailand, we take pride in being the only OEM manufacturers with dedicated production lines for wood-based and charcoal-based mosquito coils. This separation guarantees superior product quality, consistency, and customization, ensuring our clients receive the best mosquito coil solutions for their markets.
hero.paragraph2: With over 50 years of industry expertise, our commitment to innovation, stringent quality control, and tailored OEM solutions allows us to support brands worldwide in delivering high-performance mosquito coils that meet diverse market demands. Whether you require specific formulations, private labeling, branding options, or scalable production, our advanced manufacturing capabilities provide the reliability and efficiency your business needs.

whyChoose.heading: Why Choose QCI Malaysia & QCI Thailand for Your Mosquito Coil Manufacturing?
benefits: • Industry Expertise – Over five decades of experience in mosquito coil manufacturing and formulation
• Quality & Compliance – Products meet international safety and environmental standards
• Custom OEM Solutions – Full-service product development, branding, and packaging customization
• Sustainable Practices – Eco-conscious production with minimal environmental impact
• Reliable Supply Chain – Efficient global distribution and timely deliveries
whyChoose.closingText: With our presence in both Malaysia and Thailand, we offer seamless production and supply chain solutions to cater to your market's unique requirements.

cta.heading: Partner with QCI Malaysia & QCI Thailand today and gain a competitive edge with superior mosquito coil solutions tailored to your brand's needs.
cta.buttonAria: Contact us for OEM partnership opportunities

machinery.heading: Machinery
machinery.subheading: Advanced Manufacturing Solutions For Mosquito Coil Production
machinery.description: At QCI Malaysia, we rely on state-of-the-art technology to maintain the highest standards in mosquito coil manufacturing. Our production facilities are equipped with advanced one-line machines, ensuring precision, efficiency, and consistency in every coil we produce. For specialized machinery and equipment solutions, we collaborate with Yeohata, a leading manufacturer of mosquito coil production machines. Learn more about their cutting-edge technology and how it supports high-performance manufacturing.

meta.title: Careers at QCI - Join Our Team
meta.description: Join Quality Coils Industries (QCI) - Malaysia and Thailand. Explore career opportunities in mosquito coil manufacturing. We offer competitive benefits, career growth, and a positive work culture.

intro.text1: At QCI Malaysia and QCI Thailand, we are dedicated to innovation, quality, and excellence in mosquito coil manufacturing. Our success is powered by talented individuals who are passionate about making a difference. Whether you are an experienced professional or a fresh graduate eager to learn, we offer exciting career opportunities that foster growth and development in a dynamic industry.
intro.text2: At QCI Malaysia and QCI Thailand, we cultivate a positive and supportive work environment where employees can thrive. Our facilities are designed to provide a comfortable and productive workplace, ensuring both professional and personal growth.

whatWeOffer.heading: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.subheading: We are committed to creating a dynamic and rewarding workplace where hard work is valued, and teamwork drives our success.

careerGrowth.title: Career Growth Opportunities
careerGrowth.description: Performance-based salary increments and regular career reviews.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Benefits
comprehensive.description: Medical coverage, personal accident insurance, and hospitalization benefits.

workplace.title: Workplace Essentials
workplace.description: Free uniforms provided for comfort and professionalism.

facilities.title: Work & Rest Facilities
facilities.description: A well-maintained environment with designated areas for productivity and relaxation.

events.title: Annual Events
events.description: Enjoy our annual company dinner and trips as part of our team.

culture.title: Positive Work Culture
culture.description: A team-oriented, respectful, and supportive workplace.

bonuses.title: Bonuses & Incentives
bonuses.description: Performance-based rewards to recognize and appreciate employee contributions.

positions.heading: Join Us
positions.description: We are always looking for skilled professionals to join our team in various departments!

jobs.title: Dispatch
jobs.description: Dispatch duties including delivering and collecting documents. Ensure all tasks are handled with care and confidentiality.

jobs.title: Chemist
jobs.description: Ensures product quality by performing daily tests on mosquito coil batches, analyzing raw materials, and coordinating with teams to meet customer and export standards.

jobs.title: Internship & Graduate Programs
jobs.description: We offer internship opportunities for students and recent graduates to gain hands-on experience. Our structured programs provide mentorship, training, and exposure to real-world manufacturing and business operations.
